title: Matches
description: The results of a matching algorithm run on a NeuronImage.

inputImage.title: Input image
inputImage.description: Input image to the matching algorithm.

results.title: Results
results.description: List of other images matching the input image.

Files.title: Files
Files.description: Files associated with a NeuronImage or Match. These are either absolute URLs (e.g. starting with a protocol like http://) or relative paths. For relative paths, the first component should be replaced with its corresponding base URL from the DataConfig.

ColorDepthMip.title: Color Depth MIP
ColorDepthMip.description: The CDM of the image. For PPPM, this is the best matching channel of the matching LM stack and called 'Best Channel CDM' in the NeuronBridge GUI.

ColorDepthMipThumbnail.title: Thumbnail
ColorDepthMipThumbnail.description: The thumbnail sized version of the ColorDepthMip, if available.

ColorDepthMipInput.title: CDM input
ColorDepthMipInput.description: CDM-only. The actual color depth image that was input. 'Matched CDM' in the NeuronBridge GUI.

ColorDepthMipMatch.title: CDM match
ColorDepthMipMatch.description: CDM-only. The actual color depth image that was matched. 'Matched CDM' in the NeuronBridge GUI.

ColorDepthMipSkel.title: CDM with EM overlay
ColorDepthMipSkel.description: PPPM-only. The CDM of the best matching channel with the matching LM segmentation fragments overlaid. 'LM - Best Channel CDM with EM overlay' in the NeuronBridge GUI.

SignalMip.title: All-channel MIP of the sample
SignalMip.description: PPPM-only. The full MIP of all channels of the matching sample. 'LM - Sample All-Channel MIP' in the NeuronBridge GUI.

SignalMipMasked.title: PPPM fragments
SignalMipMasked.description: PPPM-only. LM signal content masked with the matching LM segmentation fragments. 'PPPM Mask' in the NeuronBridge GUI.

SignalMipMaskedSkel.title: PPPM fragments with EM overlay
SignalMipMaskedSkel.description: PPPM-only. LM signal content masked with the matching LM segmentation fragments, overlaid with the EM skeleton. 'PPPM Mask with EM Overlay' in the NeuronBridge GUI.

SignalMipExpression.title: MIP of full LM line expression
SignalMipExpression.description: MCFO-only. A representative CDM image of the full expression of the line.

VisuallyLosslessStack.title: LM 3D image stack
VisuallyLosslessStack.description: LMImage-only. An H5J 3D image stack of all channels of the LM image.

AlignedBodySWC.title: EM body in SWC format
AlignedBodySWC.description: EMImage-only, A 3D SWC skeleton of the EM body in the alignment space.

AlignedBodyOBJ.title: EM body in OBJ format
AlignedBodyOBJ.description: EMImage-only. A 3D OBJ representation of the EM body in the alignment space.

LMImage.title: LM image
LMImage.description: A color depth image of a single channel of an LM image stack.

id.title: Image identifier
id.description: The unique identifier for this image.

libraryName.title: Library name
libraryName.description: Name of the image library containing this image.

publishedName.title: Published name
publishedName.description: Published name for the contents of this image. This is not a unique identifier.

alignmentSpace.title: Alignment space
alignmentSpace.description: Alignment space to which this image was registered.

slideCode.title: Slide code
slideCode.description: Unique identifier for the sample that was imaged.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: Magnification of the microscope objective used to imaged this image.

anatomicalArea.title: Anatomical area
anatomicalArea.description: Anatomical area of the sample that was imaged.

mountingProtocol.title: Mounting protocol
mountingProtocol.description: Description of the protocol used to mount the sample for imaging.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: Channel index within the full LM image stack. PPPM matches the entire stack and therefore this is blank.

EMImage.title: EM image
EMImage.description: A color depth image containing a neuron body reconstructed from EM imagery.

id.title: Image identifier
id.description: The unique identifier for this image.

libraryName.title: Library name
libraryName.description: Name of the image library containing this image.

publishedName.title: Published name
publishedName.description: Published name for the contents of this image. This is not a unique identifier.

alignmentSpace.title: Alignment space
alignmentSpace.description: Alignment space to which this image was registered.

CDSMatch.title: CDS match
CDSMatch.description: A CDSMatch is a match generated by the CDS algorithm between an EMImage and a LMImage.

mirrored.title: Mirror flag
mirrored.description: Indicates whether the target image was found within a mirrored version of the matching image.

normalizedScore.title: Normalized score
normalizedScore.description: Match score reported by the matching algorithm

matchingPixels.title: Matching pixels
matchingPixels.description: Number of matching pixels reported by the CDS algorithm

PPPMatch.title: PPPM match
PPPMatch.description: A PPPMatch is a match generated by the PPPM algorithm between an EMImage and a LMImage.

mirrored.title: Mirror flag
mirrored.description: Indicates whether the target image was found within a mirrored version of the matching image.

pppRank.title: PPPM rank
pppRank.description: Fractional rank reported by the PPPM algorithm. It's generally better to use the index of the image in the results.

pppScore.title: PPPM score
pppScore.description: Match score reported by the PPPM algorithm.
